sentences.en: A brilliant shaft of sunlight burst through the doorway.
sentences.cn: 一束耀眼的阳光从门口照射进来。

sentences.en: a success through and through.
sentences.cn: 大获全胜

sentences.en: He reached the garden gate and thrust his way through it.
sentences.cn: 他来到花园门口，挤了进去。

sentences.en: Her plea of guilty to manslaughter through provocation was rejected.
sentences.cn: 她因受到挑衅而过失杀人的有罪答辩被驳回。

sentences.en: How many working days were lost through sickness last year?
sentences.cn: 去年因为员工生病损失了多少个工作日？

sentences.en: I managed to squeeze through a gap in the hedge.
sentences.cn: 我设法从篱笆上的一个缺口挤了过去。

sentences.en: I saw through your little ruse from the start.
sentences.cn: 从一开始我就看穿了你的小计谋。

sentences.en: I've gotten my feet thoroughly soaked and feel frozen through and through.
sentences.cn: 我双脚湿透，感觉都冻到骨头里了。

sentences.en: Mobutu ascended through the ranks, eventually becoming commander of the army.
sentences.cn: 蒙博托出身行伍，通过一级级晋升，最终成为了陆军司令。

sentences.en: News of 160 redundancies had sent tremors through the community.
sentences.cn: 将会裁员160人的消息在该团体中掀起了一阵骚动。

sentences.en: Score lightly at first and then repeat, scoring deeper each time until the board is cut through.
sentences.cn: 先轻轻地划一下，然后反复划，一次比一次划得深些，直到木板被完全割开。

sentences.en: She got her first job through an employment agency.
sentences.cn: 她通过职业介绍所得到了第一份工作。

sentences.en: She passed the needle through the rough cloth, back and forth.
sentences.cn: 她一针一针地缝那块粗布。

sentences.en: She smiled at him as he walked through the door.
sentences.cn: 他从门口进来时，她朝他笑了。

sentences.en: Teddy ran thick fingers through his unruly thatch of hair.
sentences.cn: 泰迪用自己的粗手指头捋了一下浓密蓬乱的头发。

sentences.en: The company I work for went through a rough patch.
sentences.cn: 我所在的公司经历了一段困难时期。

sentences.en: The heated gas is piped through a coil surrounded by water.
sentences.cn: 受热气体通过水中的盘管输送。

sentences.en: The passengers went through immigration control and collected their baggage.
sentences.cn: 旅客通过入境检查后领取了自己的行李。

sentences.en: The savoury smell greeted them as they went through the door.
sentences.cn: 他们进门时一阵香味扑鼻而来。

sentences.en: The winner of each preliminary goes through to the final.
sentences.cn: 每场初赛的获胜者进入决赛。

sentences.en: There were people standing in the doorway and I couldn’t get through.
sentences.cn: 有人站在门口，我过不去。

sentences.en: They were suddenly plunged into darkness as the train went through a tunnel.
sentences.cn: 火车穿过隧道，他们顿时陷入黑暗之中。

sentences.en: Water will be pumped through a pipe.
sentences.cn: 水将通过管子抽上来。

sentences.en: wet through and through.
sentences.cn: 湿透了

sentences.en: You simply can't get a ticket through official channels.
sentences.cn: 通过官方渠道是压根儿搞不到票的.

words.tran_cn: [公路] 高速公路，[公路] 直达道路

phrases.tran_cn: 参加；经受；仔细检查；被通过
一路走过（歌词）；经过所有（歌词）

trans.tran_cn: 直达的，直通的，完成的，关系了结的
trans.tran_en: a train by which you can reach a place, without having to use other trains

trans.tran_cn: 通过，从头到尾，直达，（电话）接通，完全
穿过，通过，自始至终，直至，因为，凭借，遍布，经历，彻底地，透过/通过…感知，在…之中
